entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:06 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:06 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow and blowing snow beginning in the morning. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:06 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
